lead_paragraph: There were 69 allegations of sexual exploitation and abuse reported in 10 peacekeeping missions in 2015, the report says as it calls for on-site courts-martial of the accused.

headline.print_headline: United Nations; Sex Abuse Report Lists Missions
headline.main: U.N. Report Describes Sex Abuse Allegations About Peacekeeping Missions

snippet: There were 69 allegations of sexual exploitation and abuse reported in 10 peacekeeping missions in 2015, the report says as it calls for on-site courts-martial of the accused.
abstract: United Nations report alleges there were 69 incidents of sexual exploitation on 10 peacekeeping missions in 2015 and provides names of all countries whose troops are said to be involved.
